website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward all-in-one that works well for a variety of tasks. Great display.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: For those, like myself, who use a compute largely for email and surfing the net it would be hard to find a better machine at this price point. Easy set up and it's up and running just as soon as plugged in. Large non-glare screen.is an attractive component. Keyboard is Dell's standard cheapo but it does the job and it's nice to have it and the mouse wireless. It comes with surprisingly good and long in-your-house hardware warranty but there is no software support offered by Dell on computers not sold by them directly. Don't be put off by things you've heard about Windows 10; in fact, it's a good operating system and not difficult to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy- Could be void of any manufacturers warranty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and would not properly download the updated windows software on start up. Lagged so bad I felt like I was on dial up. Called Dell to get tech support and they refused saying the AIO was sold to the third party suplier that sold it to me over 250 days ago and was informed I would need to pay for any support on software. I couldn't believe it so I checked the ad for this on Amazon and seller claims we get full I year warranty. Not so much. Amazon is taking it back and gave me a 30 dollar certificate for my trouble. I appreciate how they back their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Guild

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and setup....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Setup (updates) took a while but I expected that. Checking it out now and so far so good. True test will be on the games I play, MMO's and such. Love the wide screen beautiful colors, great speed. For me this was a good buy. First time I have used a Dell, :) love it so far. Thank You. Edit Update...fantastic on the MMO's that I play. Office products on this machine, fantastic. messaging on social sites, good. speed is for what I do, great.
customer_reviews.author: AE. Roud

customer_reviews.title: Month Old and it "can't find the hard drive"
customer_reviews.text: When this PC was approximately a month old, it began sending me periodic messages about an impending component failure. The error code points to the disk drive. I ran the Dell Disk diagnostics and everything passed. The problem did not reoccur for a week or two. Now the unit freezes and shuts itself down on a daily basis. I had said years ago that I would never buy another Dell. I should not have broken my promise to myself.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: Love this new All in One Dell computer
customer_reviews.text: Love this new All in One Dell computer. Beautiful large screen, great sound quality and super fast i3 chip. Should have upgraded sooner. Minor business applications I use are fast, with no interference with the other applications running at the same time. A totally fast, quiet, efficient, quality computing experience. And I don't miss the "messy mass" of wires. Would definitely recommend to others looking for a great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck AB

customer_reviews.title: Erratic activity after two years
customer_reviews.text: THIS COMPUTER WORKED FINE FOR TWO YEARS; THEN IT STARTED DISCONNECTING FROM THE INTERNET WHEN IT HAD BEEN INACTIVE FOR A COUPLE OF HOURS IT HAS MICROSOFT WINDOWS 10 INSTALLED. .... WHEN IT DISCONNECTS IT TAKES FROM 15 MINUTES TO 75 MINUTES TO RECONNECT. A COMPUTER-SAVVY FRIEND SAID THAT IT MAY HAVE SOME PROTECTIVE PROGRAM INSTALLED TO DISCONNECT IT WHEN IT IS INACTIVE FOR A FEW HOURS. I WASTE A LOT OF TIME NURSING IT BACK. MICROSOFT CHARGED ME $195 TO UPDATE IT FROM THE PHILLIPINES, BUT IT STARTED ACTING UP AGAIN AFTER TWO DAYS. MIGHT IT HAVE SOME TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE INTERNAL CONNECTION THAT DISCONNECTS ON COOLING? JCK
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This Dell replaces an older model . Works perfectly with a very nice large screen.. The only thing I am not thrilled with is Windows 10 which comes preloaded. Another sad note, Windows no longer will allow you to back up the operating system so if your hard drive has problems; good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No support of the product from Dell required to go ...
customer_reviews.text: No support of the product from Dell required to go through Amazon and return it for repair when I'm just needing text support after an update ridiculous! Do not buy your computers from Amazon no support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a home computer
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer and the fact that it's a compact, all-in-one system---no tower to clutter things up. The screen is large and vivid and the system is easy to operate, although, I'll admit that I have not even explored all of it's capabilities. The speaker on the front of the monitor offers good sound for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: JamieT22

customer_reviews.title: This is sad. Dell was once the best of the best
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these computers. They both stopped working at roughly the same time. They were used in offices 30 miles apart, so it is not a wiring issue. They both suffered identical failure symptoms, over the course of a couple of weeks. Dell thinks it is a coincidence. I think it is a failure on Dell's part to take responsibility for producing an inferior product. This is sad. Dell was once the best of the best. Not anymore. Customer service was pitiful to add injury to insult. I am so disappointed. I wish I could provide this product with 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Screen often randomly just goes black. Usually can recover, but sometimes need to reboot.
customer_reviews.text: Often the screen goes black, even though the computer is still running. Most times, moving the mouse or tapping on the keyboard brings it back with a little "PC" icon in the lower right. However about once a week, the screen stays black, and I need to restart - losing any work and being a real annoyance. A web search shows that many people are having the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer because my last PC was a DELL, unfortunatly my old one lasted much longer than this one, still works. I only had this one for three (3) years and the Hard Drive crashed and burned.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Kalina

customer_reviews.title: At first it wouldn't even start up, then when ...
customer_reviews.text: At first it wouldn't even start up, then when it finally did, it ran sooooo slow because the disk continued to run at 100%. I reset computer and reinstalled windows and it still ran at 100% making it run so, so slow and very frustrating. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Power supply died.  Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Power supply just died. I've barely used the machine and expected a higher level of quality than this. And now I have to return the power supply and they'll take up to 10 days to send me a new one? Not good Dell or Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: L. V. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Not the best. Try HP or something else
customer_reviews.text: Sucks half the time. If I put it on sleep mode, when i am ready to use the computer again, within the same hour at minimum, the monitor doesn’t turn back on and I have to manually force it to shut off. The computer moves really slow sometimes. Otherwise it’s good when it isn’t glitchy. I didn’t go through the hassle of replacing. But I should have gotten an HP probably.
customer_reviews.author: SugaRita BooBoo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: My one and only product review. Do not buy this unless you want to constantly troubleshoot computer issues. I only needed this for basic internet tasks that would be difficult to do on a mobile device. It can barely stay connected to the internet long enough to download updates much less anything else. Save your money or spend a little more on better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: SHIPS WITH A 100Mbps NETWORK CARD!  Obsolete for a decade.
customer_reviews.text: As crazy as it sounds, I bough this in 2017 only to find that it ships with at 10/100mbps Ethernet adapter. Nowhere is this listed on the product page, or specs page or anywhere even remotely easily visible. My home internet connection is 950Mbps. THIS THING SHIPPED WITH ETHERNET THAT IS 1/10 THE SPEED OF MY INTERNET CONNECTION! The wired network on this computer was technically obsolete 19 years ago and practically obsolete about 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: LDV Hospitality

customer_reviews.title: Piece of doo doo
customer_reviews.text: Required a tech to come out after 6 months to correct an error message that we need the "correct power source." We were using the one from the manufacturer. Went out again with the same error message and paid $39 for shipping to have them tell me out of warranty repair will be $220. Called and it's the motherboard $171 and Labor $49. I told them to keep the piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Roemer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my on-line schooling
customer_reviews.text: no issues at this time. Works great for my on-line schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Cavin

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: Love the computer layout, size, etc... It seems to crash every once in a while though. I've had it for 3 months now, and it has probably crashed 3-4 times, so ~1x per month so far. It's annoying and I'm sure it will get worse as the product ages. Other than that, I'm happy with the screen, the performance, the camera is good for skype, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this computer for my husband and its been like a month now since i purchased this computer but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my husband and its been like a month now since i purchased this computer but so far we didn't get any experienced problem about this computer, its fast and i like everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie27

customer_reviews.title: Slow and freezes...... takes forever to warm up
customer_reviews.text: Super slow and freezes a lot. From day one it has taken a long time to warm and get going. I use it for business so really not over taxing but Monday mornings after no use for a weekend...it is sooooooo slow. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not without problems.
customer_reviews.text: The wireless keyboard doesn't let you quickly type the same character twice -- as in words like "little" and "happy." They come out like "litle" and "hapy". Very annoying. And Windows absolutely sucks. So I installed Linux Mint on it.
customer_reviews.author: Yeah

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this machine
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this machine. Have had it a while now. Does what I expected. Good monitor with solid clarity. Starts up quickly. Handles all the task I have thrown at it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P

customer_reviews.title: Wireless stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago and everything was ok at first. Now the wireless mouse and keyboard no longer work. I am not pleased. I am adding to this review on 4/28/18. Not only have all the wireless items stopped working, but now the screen keeps going black. This computer is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with this product and in the window 10 in ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with this product and in the window 10 in this is constantly updating its constantly screwing up I would not buy this again Dell needs to do a better job with their product. Having problems with it's outdated graphic hardware.
customer_reviews.author: christine jackson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Horrible
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of rubbish!!!!! The machine runs so slowly. I cannot believe that a computer can go slow...especially one from Dell. I wish I could return it!!! Horrible. Horrible.... I want to give it ZERO stars!!!! Angry!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The computer was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this computer for over a month now. At first he was a bit overwhelmed by the enormous 24 inch monitor, but now he loves it. The computer was very easy to set up. The processing speed is fast, and the screen resolution is extremely clear.
customer_reviews.author: txazn

customer_reviews.title: The intel wifi card is crap.
customer_reviews.text: The wifi card doesn't stay connected. It Causes the system to lock up or run slow.. No problems with other devices connecting to my wifi. I am running on Ethernet now and everything works fine. Dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Rich W

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Super. If the keyboard and mouse don't work, Install the batteries lol
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.text: Still using this All in One! No problems what so ever. Its really neat if I want to take it to another room, I just pick it up and go. (no tower to worry about) If you don't want to spend a lot and have a nice all-in-one, this is your product!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine T. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Dell Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Oh I do so love this computer! Easy to set up and great to use! There is even extra help built right into it if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Navarijo

customer_reviews.title: dell all in one
customer_reviews.text: I liked the all in one computer I don't like the warranty they have only 6mo and will not stand behind not worth the money!!! can buy one at local Wal-mart if it breaks you can always return it for another one
customer_reviews.author: RPD

customer_reviews.title: For everyday stuff it's great.. AND if you put a SSD into ...
customer_reviews.text: For everyday stuff it's great.. AND if you put a SSD into it.. it becomes 60% faster.. I love it..
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful computer, but the processor is slower than you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Karmegi

customer_reviews.title: OK Computer, not Great
customer_reviews.text: Slowest computer I've ever had. Not really an adult computer to use for business. Low level power. Don't waste your money here if you need it for anything serious. Easy to use, screen is good, slow as molasses CPU.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Olson

customer_reviews.title: Description states that this computer has HDMI out, just ...
customer_reviews.text: Description states that this computer has HDMI out, just found out at an event that it in fact, does not.
customer_reviews.author: Annaliese

customer_reviews.title: Fanatic replacement for your your desktop computer
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my desk top computer. This all in one is fast, great space saver and the size of the monitor is fantastic. I recommend it 100 percent.
customer_reviews.author: Kplus8

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: this computer is garbage. it broke down in 6 months. I lost all my data and have to re-install the operating system. (correction -- Hard drive). The computer still doesn't work correctly and dell support assistant sucks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Alter

customer_reviews.title: Ethernet adapter is not gigabit.
customer_reviews.text: Ethernet adapter is not gigabit. The product description did not include this information. If you plan on connecting to a wired network then don't waste your money on this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Annoyed buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not a super star
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, easy to set up, but not as fast as I was expecting. I wait for the login screen an loading.
customer_reviews.author: Sunman

customer_reviews.title: works super fast. No sound to it at all
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was supposed to come with a tower. I really needed a new computer. The screen is huge, works super fast. No sound to it at all. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Locket86

customer_reviews.title: Super slow unreliable piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Computer is super slow. Goes to "not responding" even with task manager. Screen goes black with only mouse cursor showing. I am going to fight to get my money back or I will be paying Dell's office a visit. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Almonte

customer_reviews.title: Not priced right
customer_reviews.text: I might have a made a mistake reading the description but I thought this was a touchscreen. It is not. The product is expensive for a non-touch.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for small business point of sale
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent computer for the price. Purchased this for a small business point of sale system and it works great. Monitor is a good size as well. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: IT_Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Missing USB receiver
customer_reviews.text: Everything was going fine with setup until I realized that the USB receiver necessary to operate wireless keyboard and mouse was missing from package
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months now and I love it. Good computer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Holton

customer_reviews.title: Nice large viewing screen!
customer_reviews.text: Love the large screen as I view and edit photos a lot to make into personalized photo cards. Also very space conserving to not have a large monitor on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Shakuroo

customer_reviews.title: It was implied that it had tpuch screen use and we didn't see thd none screen use until after it came I still really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Ilove using this, I oly wish I had known that this ne did not have the on scree use, you need to have that where it can be seen. It was implied that it had tpuch screen use and we didn't see thd none screen use until after it came I still really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: keyboard and mouse are not wireless
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard and mouse are wired. I mistakenly thought they were wireless, the picture was deceiving. I should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap! Computers aren't supposed to be this slow in 2018!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Get Started
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our old all-in-one and it works fine. Despite being several years older, doesn't have the same features as my previous model, but works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Heesacker

customer_reviews.title: DO not purchase DELL, even with the extra warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: DO not purchase DELL, even with the extra warranty you will get charged $175 just to reset your password and then they blame it on Microsoft and Amazon saying this reset disk or DVD should have been included with the computer. I have never had any issue with trying to reset my MAC on my own. I spent over an hour being passed from one agent to another in India or the Phillippines only to be told in the end they could not help me and then the DELL supervisor kept calling me back from India to say it wasn't Dell's fault but Microsofts' software problem. And the extra warranty was useless - cannot even get a hold of them.
customer_reviews.author: jamaicanese

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the slowest computer I've ever owned. Slow to boot up, slower to get online, slow to open pages, on those occasions that they even open. I don't know if this is a common problem with this computer or if I just got a lemon, but it has way too many issues. I spent 2 hours on the phone with a Dell Support "expert" halfway around the world whose first language was clearly not English, and by the end of the call he could only fault my Wi-Fi, which is functioning just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sloputt

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work perfectly, as hope for and expected. Easy transaction that worked out exactly as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Hines Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Dell does it right!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up, gorgeous screen, FAST! I really like it. The all-in-one design is great for my office....takes up very little surface space on my desk. Keyboard and mouse are wireless which is neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: norahs

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how easy the set-up is on this all-in-one Dell. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: LizFromNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few months now and we love it. No issues with heat or anything and it gets left on quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Patti K.

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up and works well so far
customer_reviews.text: packaged very well, very easy to set up and works well so far. .exchanged for a mis-ordered desktop and that transaction was handled with expected efficiency by Amazon. GOOD WORK ALL
customer_reviews.author: cws

customer_reviews.title: Overall the computer is great. The screen is huge enough and it saves ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the computer is great. The screen is huge enough and it saves space (without the computer tower). However, I was disappointed because I was expecting the programs I used will be bigger on the wider screen. And, it is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dell Inspiron 24- 3000 Series
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. Fast and easy to use. I like the all in one screen to free up space. Wireless access is nice. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. womack

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It has worked great for me, only thing I don't about it is the wiring.

customer_reviews.title: Loving the new technology.
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my update computer system. Hard to imagine I waited this long to switch to an all in one machine. It is just the greatest thing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: Using it to type this review. I have always been happy with Dell quality and it is hands down better than any HP I have owned or used.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'M USING IT RIGHT NOW AND I LOVE THIS UNIT.
customer_reviews.author: Ray E. Sr. Cedarhurst, NY

customer_reviews.title: I am sad I can't give this PC zero star rating
customer_reviews.text: I am sad I can't give this PC a zero star rating. The power jack port broke soon after the first month. This was after I moved the computer once. I only unplugged it once. I called the warranty and they said it is based on ware and tear so it isn't covered and it would cost $259 to fix without delivery charge, almost 50% of the cost of the product. Now I have a useless computer. I WILL NEVER BUY DELL AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 weeks now. It was incredibly easy to set up and it's working like a champ. I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: BirdieGirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful computer, with one small flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful computer, with one small flaw. It has only 2 USB ports, which are needed for the keyboard and mouse. The lack of any user guide is also lamentable (there are two buttons on the right hand side I don't want to experiment with.)
customer_reviews.author: Samwise

customer_reviews.title: Caps lock is this pc's down downfall.
customer_reviews.text: You read the title right... seems Dell is really bent on displaying on screen when caps lock is active. Ok, I can appreciate that however it locks the computer up every time you use it. Dell says, "just go to our website and re-download the keyboard software". After 3 downloads we give... we just hold the upper case key down. Really Dell? Side note... Windows 10 is ok but why they won't design and OS that provides just the essentials and is bulletproof is a mystery to me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve,  the man...

customer_reviews.title: Failed product
customer_reviews.text: Easily the worst pc I have ever purchased. Boot up time was typically over 10 minutes, response time exceptionally slow, and it failed outright at 18 months. I will never purchase another Dell product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Fryer

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is an outlier, but this computer won't wake up from sleep mode without a long wait. It seems like something else is happening in the background (and this has been happening since day 1).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great value and was super easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: I am not tech savvy, but this computer is working well for a personal home setup. It is a great value and was super easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Slow
customer_reviews.text: The HD runs much slower than I expected but overall it's a nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Punturieri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing My computer works amazing I can play games in ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing My computer works amazing I can play games in it and download games and even mods and the best part IT CAME IN ONE DAY I can finally also do school work It's a great Computer for a really low price I love it
customer_reviews.author: aleida v.

customer_reviews.title: not easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for setting up this computer were awful...skimpy, not easy to follow. Once I got help the computer has been fine. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Dell is good
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. Had this for awhile and no problems. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: crazylegs5651

customer_reviews.title: 7th gen i3 does not come with wireless mouse and keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Difference between 6th gen i3 and 7th gen i3 model is quite deceiving in terms of mouse and keyboard configuration. 7th gen does NOT come with wireless mouse and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: chuckers

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great after I got it to update to 2018 Windows 10. Only problem I had was there were no instructions at all. Great computer for the money!
customer_reviews.author: George Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dell Inspiron 24 3000 Series All-In-One (Intel...
customer_reviews.text: i want a new one please pick this up and give me a new one which is what i paid for have a 4 year protection or fix it i feel riped off you a bunch of thief's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO HDMI OUT
customer_reviews.text: The computer has no HDMI out port. which means it cannot be connected to a 2nd monitor or hi def television. It has an HDMI IN monitor, which I've never seen before and is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W. Trimbath

customer_reviews.title: Problems adding additional monitor
customer_reviews.text: No easy way to hook up additional monitors am having to purchase a usb3 to hdmi video converter and hope that works
customer_reviews.author: ijohn

customer_reviews.title: I love my new computer!
customer_reviews.text: Dell is a great product. Whenever I buy desktops ir laptops this is the brand I always use. My resent purchase was amazing, thank you Amazon for supplying the very best.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Manning

customer_reviews.title: I cant complain. This PC is ultra-cool. my ...
customer_reviews.text: I cant complain. This PC is ultra-cool. my only regret is that I didn't get a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Phil F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to be able to get the all in one. Has totally met my expectations to date. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No second monitor port
customer_reviews.text: I did not know from the documentation that this model will not accommodate a second monitor. Otherwise, it is sleek, takes up very little room, and powerful enough for the work I do (teaching online).
customer_reviews.author: B. King

customer_reviews.title: The best. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just hat I was hoping for. Fits the bill perfectly. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: patty ann

customer_reviews.title: Price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen and I find this a great PC. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I moved from WIndows Vista to Windows 10 with no problems

customer_reviews.title: Good all around home computer
customer_reviews.text: Really like this computer. I would next time buy one step up but it does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: gary s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: faster great look and work great in office.....i bought 2 of them and both r good
customer_reviews.author: harpreet s zapra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple computer for a good price. Not the fastest but works well. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Best

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: First all-in-one desktop I've owned. Love it. Can't go wrong with a Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne and Keith Francis

customer_reviews.title: Fabuous buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't love my new computer more - it is everything I thought it would be and more....
customer_reviews.author: Lucile Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard and mouse that come with this piece of crap computer are not wireless
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe what you see in the picture. The keyboard and mouse that come with this piece of crap computer are not wireless. Totally false advertising! Also, the clock does not sinc with the local time and there is no "change the time" option on the clock/calendar. I swore I would never buy another Dell product after my very disappointing laptop experience with them years ago and the crappy Dell laptop I just got rid of at work but because there were so many good reviews, I decided to go ahead and give them another chance. What a big $600+ mistake I have made! Dell really sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good for what it is. Do not expect blazing performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This PC is amazing, I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd "all in one" PC, my first one was an HP...ran great for nearly 10 years until it started freezing several times a day and then finally gave up the ghost. I have nothing but good things to say about this Dell. It is excellent for what I need it for. I don't need or do gaming, so that is not an issue for me. As other reviewers have said, I highly recommend this PC if you don't need gaming. And the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don't have a tower sitting on my desk or floor collecting dust. As to the operation, so far I find it adequate for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a piece of garbage, it doesn't even have 5 months and it's already giving me problems the apps crash all the time and it stays on a loop forever. Worst piece of cheap crap ever purchased here.
customer_reviews.author: Erika B.

customer_reviews.title: And a good deal for the
customer_reviews.text: Within my expectations. And a good deal for the price

customer_reviews.text: much better than assembling computers from old parts and shoelaces around the office. i understand now why people buy new computers.

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 24 3000 Series All-In-One (Intel Core i3, 8 GB RAM, 500 GB HDD)
product_meta.description: processor_description:6th Gen Core i3| Size:500 GB HDD | NontouchThe perfect addition to your home. Big screen action. Family-sized value. With a full HD wide-viewing-angle display and easy one-cord set up, the Intel-powered Inspiron 24 3000 Series All-in-One desktop is the perfect fit for the whole family.
feature_bullets: Take entertainment to the next level with the latest Intel processor. Engineered for uncompromising graphics, powerful performance, and stunning visuals making your favorite media even more enjoyable.
Outfitted with faster and longer-range 802.11 ac wireless, multiple USB 2.0 and 3.0 ports, HDMI-in, 4-in-1 Multicard Reader and Ethernet capabilities for seamless interaction with other devices.
Advanced audio: Built-in stereo speakers tuned with Waves MaxxAudio solution and a widescreen HD Webcam allow crisp, clear online Skype sessions with your family and friends.
With a 500 GB hard drive and optical disk drive, there is plenty of space to store the whole family’s movies, memories, and school projects while still providing a smooth, lag-free performance.
Easy to use DT that’s a smart buy for the family. Stunning 24" Full HD wide-viewing-angle display, responsive performance of a PC, integrated speakers and webcam, all in an attractivley thin design.
